title: The Kings Majesties letter to the Lord Mayor and Court of Alderman, of the city of London, concerning the choice of Common-Council men, 1661
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
At end of text: given at our court at White-hall, the 13th of December, 1661, and in the 13th year of our reign.
